title: Palaeoverse
text: We host a community space for palaeobiologists using the Google Groups platform. This space provides an area to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues in an informal setting. Questions related to palaeoverse packages are also welcome. The group is unmoderated, but it is a space for all so as always be kind and respectful to others. Harrassment of individuals will result in removal from the group.

title: Introduction to Analytical Palaeobiology
text:
Short description:
This course will provide a complete guide to basic analytical techniques for examining macroevolutionary and biodiversity patterns using online databases (primarily The Paleobiology Database), from instruction on data collection, handling, and curation, to plotting and publishing results.
Further information

title: EGU Annual Meeting 2023
text:
Short description:
The EGU General Assembly 2023 brings together geoscientists from all over the world to one meeting covering all disciplines of the Earth, planetary, and space sciences. The EGU aims to provide a forum where scientists, especially early career researchers, can present their work and discuss their ideas with experts in all fields of geoscience.
Further information

title: PalAss Annual Meeting 2023
text:
Short description:
The 67th Annual Meeting of the Palaeontological Association will be held at the University of Cambridge from 11th to 15th September 2023.
Further information

title: Assistant Professor, Paleobiology
text:
Short description:
The Department of Biological Sciences in the College of Sciences at North Carolina State University (NC State) seeks outstanding candidates for a tenure-track faculty position in Paleobiology at the preferred rank of Assistant Professor, although exceptional candidates for Associate Professor will be considered.
Further information

title: R Packages
text:
sepkoski
sepkoski provides access to Sepkoski’s fossil marine animal genera compendium (Sepkoski, 2002). The aim of the package is to offer a light and easily-accessible solution to working with Sepkoski’s compendium to support teaching exercises. Go to site…

title: Palaeoverse Directory
text:
Welcome to the Palaeoverse Directory! This resource is provided to promote the communciation of upcoming conferences, workshops, and vacancies. It also provides a register of research labs and their research focus. We hope that this resource will foster networking and collaboration across the globe.
If you wish to register an upcoming conference, workshop, vacancy or your lab, please complete the submission form.
Posts shared here do not imply endorsement from the Palaeoverse team and we can hold no responsibility for any interactions you make via this service. If you face any issues or have any concerns about current postings, please contact a member of the Palaeoverse team.
